SEARCH
Package authenticationpkg

Class AuthStudent

java.lang.Object
authenticationpkg.AuthUser
authenticationpkg.AuthStudent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthCCMember
public class AuthStudent extends AuthUser
AuthStudent represents the account type of normal students. This class inherits from AuthUser.
See Also:
